Module com.example.flashcardai
Package app

Class DeckManagerController

java.lang.Object
app.DeckManagerController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class DeckManagerController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Controller for managing decks in the flashcard application.

This JavaFX controller handles:

  • Displaying all decks in a TableView
  • Deck selection and navigation to review sessions
  • Deck deletion functionality
  • Navigation to dashboard and login screens

UI Components:

  • TableView showing deck names and descriptions
  • Delete buttons for each deck row
  • Click handlers for deck selection

Since:
1.0
See Also:

  • DeckDAO

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      Initializes the controller after FXML loading.

      Sets up:

      • TableView column bindings
      • Deck data loading from database
      • Row click handlers
      • Delete button configuration

      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      url - The location used to resolve relative paths for the root object
      resourceBundle - The resources used to localize the root object

    • handleDashboard

      public void handleDashboard(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Handles navigation to the dashboard view.

      Loads the dashboard for the currently logged-in user. Falls back to login view if no user is authenticated.

      Parameters:
      event - the ActionEvent that triggered this navigation
      See Also:
      • DashboardController
      • UserDAO

    • handleLogin

      public void handleLogin(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Handles navigation to the login view.

      Clears any existing user session and returns to the login screen.

      Parameters:
      event - the ActionEvent that triggered this navigation
